t: John Rich - Underneath The Same Moon - Amazon.com Music
s: I got this CD based on John Rich's reputation alone. I knew of many of the songs he had written over the years for various artists as well as his reputation in "Big & Rich". I was a little skeptical at first, but after I listened, I knew it was a purchase I do not regret.

t: Fair & Square by Prine, John (2005) Audio CD - Amazon.com Music
John Rich - Son Of A Preacher Man - Amazon.com Music

s: This rocks from start to finish!! No dead air. Guest DJ's like Kid Rock, Lil John, Cowboy Troy, and Hank Jr. fill the gaps between songs. Every song is hard country rock. A must have for John Rich and Big$Rich fans! Great party cd!

John Rich is an American country music singer-songwriter. From 1992 to 1998, he was a member of the country music band Lonestar, in which he played bass guitar and alternated with Richie McDonald as lead vocalist.
